switch 开关

      <div class="switch">
        <input id="switch" type="checkbox" />	//有个不好的地方就是每个开关都有个id
        <label for="switch"></label>		//input 可以设置checked, disabled
      </div>
		
    .switch {
      width: 50px;
      height: 22px;
      display: inline-block;
      vertical-align: middle;
    }
    .switch input {
      display: none;
    }
    .switch input:disabled ~ label {
      cursor: not-allowed;
    }
    .switch input:checked ~ label {
      background: #0ae;
    }
    .switch input:checked~label:after {
      left: 30px;
    }
    .switch label {
      position: relative;
      display: block;
      height: 100%;
      width: 100%;
      background: #ff4949;
      cursor: pointer;
      border-radius: 22px;
      transition: background-color 0.3s;
    }
    .switch label:after {
      height: 18px;
      width: 18px;
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      top: 2px;
      left: 2px;
      content: '';
      border-radius: 100%;
      background: #fff;
      transition: left 0.2s;
    }
